title: Wall Street's Epic Bonuses Are Back
itunes:title: Wall Street's Epic Bonuses Are Back
description:
Angeleena May, Executive Director for AMFM Healthcare, discusses how the pandemic has impacted people's mental health. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Sri Natarajan shares his Bloomberg Big Take story Big Bonuses Bring Back Good Old Days for Wall Street Rainmakers. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News ETF Czar Sam Potter explain why investors are sticking with ARK despite recent woes for Cathie Wood’s innovation fund. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Jenny Surane reports on PayPal saying it closed 4.5 million accounts and lowered its forecast for new customers after finding “bad actors” were taking advantage of its incentives and rewards programs. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Rosen, Chief Investment Officer at Angeles Wealth Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.
